snippet: Alex O’Loughlin, the star of the CBS drama “Hawaii Five-0,” will miss the production of at least one episode this month.
abstract: Alex O’Loughlin, star of the CBS drama Hawaii Five-0, will miss production of at least one episode as he seeks treatment for problems related to prescription pain medication.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

lead_paragraph: Alex O’Loughlin, the star of the CBS drama “Hawaii Five-0,” will miss the production of at least one episode this month.
